description.zh-CN: 技术蓝图风格的介面，采用工程绘图美学。展现严谨的结构化布局和专业技术氛围。适合工程和技术应用。，展现严谨的结构化布局和专业技术氛围。技术蓝图风格采用工程图纸美学，展现严谨结构化布局。适合技术仪表板和工程应用。
description.en-US: Technical blueprint-style interface design with authentic engineering drawing aesthetics, showcasing rigorous structured layouts and professional technical atmospheres. Ideal for engineering applications, technical dashboards, CAD software, industrial control systems, architectural tools, research platforms, and professional environments requiring precise grid-based composition, systematic organization, technical clarity, measurement accuracy, and structured information hierarchy for complex data visualization and sophisticated engineering workflows across diverse multi-disciplinary projects. precise structured organization and comprehensive technical documentation. Ensures exceptional design quality through strategic principles and thoughtful implementation. Delivers technical clarity with precise structured organization and comprehensive data visualization.

title.zh-CN: 结构完整性监控仪表板
